question_text: Which role does the application provider play in SaaS?
answer_options: They supply hardware only; the customer builds the app
They offer authentication servers but no user-facing apps
They manage the infrastructure, app logic, and updates
They host source code for customer-compiled programs
correct_answer: They manage the infrastructure, app logic, and updates
explanation: In SaaS, the application provider manages the entire stack and keeps the application running and updated.
